name: Verify phone number from a new row in Google sheets
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically verify a phone number from the specified cell and update the row with information about this number. The template uses thisÂ [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19HzqYbXBE_8bVxnJoC7PYtVrBdpclrRfAdpzEl1xP3g/edit?usp=sharing).
